name: FollowUpWithinOneYear
title: Follow Up Within One Year
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent capturing the follow-up encounter within one year of the initial encounter.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Encounter. Intention to represent follow-up visits within a one-year period.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with capturing the follow-up between 1 day to 12 month of the initial finding.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
